pages.text: Before you can start working on contracts you need to create a new group or join an existing group. Each group is defined by a group name and a password.$(br)All players in a group share contracts, balance and the level.

You can join an existing group by entering the command $(italic)$(#00F)/group join <group_name> <group_password>$().$(br)If you want to create a new group enter the command $(italic)$(#00F)/group create <group_name> <group_password>$().
